Name: Sanguinello Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of blood orange slice wheel.
Review: Bitter notes are balanced by sweet, lemony limoncello with blood orange juice contributing citrus freshness.
History: This well-established Italian classic is named after one of the three most common varieties of blood oranges; the Sanguinello orange is native to Spain.
Nutrition: One serving of Sanguinello Cocktail contains 99 calories
